  3. Departments
Office Hours are Monday - Thursday 7:30 am to 5pm and Friday 8am to Noon. * Building Permits can be submitted in person or by email at building.codes@cityofbrazoria.org *Payments can be made online or in person *Inspections require a 24 hour notice. Same day inspections will be an extra fee *If we are out of the office, please call 979-798-2489, choose option 3, for permits. Leave a message and he will return your call as soon as possible.

The International Codes (I-Codes), developed by the International Code Council, are a family of fifteen coordinated, modern building safety codes that help ensure the engineering of safe, sustainable, affordable and resilient structures.  Please use this link to learn more about I-Codes:                        h ttps://codes.iccsafe.org/codes/i-codes
